page.title: 06A Day In The Life Of ...
page.content: I go to school every day exept Saturday and Sunday.Every monday I get up really late and have to wizz down stairs remembering what day it is. After breakfast I go back upstairs and get dressed.My mum is 32 ,my dad 38 and my sister is 7.I go down to school on my BMX.In our class there are only 9 children.In the whole school there are only 30 children and 2 teachers.My friend are Douglas who I sometimes fall out with an Spam,Alex, Adam,Stephen,Ben and Matthew.At play- time we play football.After play we do SMP maths.For dinner I bring a packed lunch and then go out to play football again.In the afternoon we do English and the teacher reads us a story.Then I go home and watch TV till tea-time. After tea I watch TV a bit more then play with my Lego.I go to bed at 10 o' clock and read for about half an hour.
